org.dockbox.selene.core.annotations.extension

Annotation Type Extension


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Extension
    The interface to mark a type as a extension.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String[] authors
      The authors of the extension.
      String description
      The human-readable description of the extension.
      String id
      The identifier of the extension, in snake_case.
      String name
      The human-readable name of the extension.
      String uniqueId
      The unique ID (UUID) of the extension.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String[] dependencies
      The qualified names of packages required to be present by the extension.
      boolean requiresNMS
      Marks whether or not the extension requires access to Native Minecraft Sources (NMS).
      String url
      The url of the homepage for the extension.
      String version
      The version of the extension.

    • Element Detail

      • id

        public abstract String id
        The identifier of the extension, in snake_case. This is typically used to obtain the extension instance, header, or context through ExtensionManager.
        Returns:
        the identifier

      • name

        public abstract String name
        The human-readable name of the extension.
        Returns:
        the name

      • description

        public abstract String description
        The human-readable description of the extension.
        Returns:
        the human-readable description

      • authors

        public abstract String[] authors
        The authors of the extension. Preferably using GitHub usernames, though real names or other aliases are permitted.
        Returns:
        the authors of the extension

      • uniqueId

        public abstract String uniqueId
        The unique ID (UUID) of the extension. In the format of UUID. For example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
        Returns:
        the unique ID

      • version

        public abstract String version
        The version of the extension.
        Returns:
        the version
        Default:
        "unknown"

      • url

        public abstract String url
        The url of the homepage for the extension. Defaults to the homepage for Selene.
        Returns:
        the url of the homepage
        Default:
        "https://github.com/GuusLieben/Selene"

      • dependencies

        public abstract String[] dependencies
        The qualified names of packages required to be present by the extension. For example java.lang.
        Returns:
        the packages requires by the extension.
        Default:
        {}

      • requiresNMS

        public abstract boolean requiresNMS
        Marks whether or not the extension requires access to Native Minecraft Sources (NMS). If the platform does not support NMS the extension will not be loaded.
        Returns:
        true if the extension requires NMS access.
        Default:
        false
